title: Dear Anne, Love Kitty
description: When Belle McLeod was entering adolescence, she looked to strong women of the past as guides and inspiration. Reading Anne Frank's letters to Kitty, she decided that she would write to Anne.This is her first volume of letters, chronicling the obsession of a first love, what it meant to grow up in two households, and crazy things she witnessed along the way (because who else's father decided to build some teepees in the back yard?)
author: Salilabelle McLeod
